description: The Afton Alps Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Afton Alps for the snow report
Alexa, ask Afton Alps for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Afton Alps
shortDescription: The Afton Alps Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Afton Alps.
